28th October 1952
Mr. Graydon Ausmus
WUOA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon:
I appreciate your note of October 24th. Perhaps there
was some reason for you to make a personal trip to
North Carolina, but I thought you could just as well
have offered Wynn the job by means of a single tele¬
phone call. I presume, however, that there must be
compelling reasons for you to take the journey.
I still do not agree with your idea of inviting repre¬
sentatives of Foundations and other educational groups
in connection with the place that NAEB will have in
the television picture. ... at least until we have decided
our own sphere of influence by ourselves. I fear that
at such a Board Meeting we would be washing our linens
a la Battle Creek,
Best wishes.
Seymour N. Siegel
President
